name: Login Flow
description: User authenticates with email and password

error_handling.recovery: Clear password, show error, focus email
Show lockout message with support contact

mermaid:
flowchart TD
    START([Open login page]) --> A[Enter email]
    A --> B[Enter password]
    B --> C[Click Login]
    C -->|Valid| D[Dashboard]
    C -->|Invalid| E[Show error]
    E --> A
    D --> END([User logged in])
